channel.title: Rics webclient tutorial(where shud this go)help.WILL REP!
channel.description:
Hey all I recently followed rics webclient tutorial im using 317 basically i get 2 problems One,i put the html on smfforfree.com and this is the error. [code]
load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://pastascape.smfforfree.com/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class [/code] Ric's faq said delete all class files. I do that and i get 100 errors on my client.... Please help

item.title: Rics webclient tutorial(where shud this go)help.WILL REP!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

as in,remove all class files apart from client.class?
I wil give it a go mate.

item.title: Rics webclient tutorial(where shud this go)help.WILL REP!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://pastascape.smfforfree.com/client/class.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
… 7 more
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class

I still get this?
DO i have 2 do anything once i put client.class back in?
Like ‘re-jar’ it?

item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hey all
I recently followed rics webclient tutorial
im using 317
basically
i get 2 problems
One,i put the html on smfforfree.com and this is the error.


load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)

Ric’s faq said delete all class files.

Please help
